title: Continue on the kadarin project

embed.description: Today we're looking at a Potential New Champion, but I'm wondering, Should Riot Release KADARIN? âž¥ Champion design has become my most favorite thing to talk about so I hope you guys enjoy these videos as much as I do making them!

body: i honestly reckon kadarin would be a great new champ to play and honestly should be tested, the link sends you to a video about him and how he got started as a project, he has great potential and would love t be able to play him
